text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity @FoxNews DEAR WHITE HOUSE DEATH PANEL LEADER,
We understand that our wartime President has surrendered without a fight to the coronavirus and you have decided to sacrifice our vulnerable seniors to improve your reelection chances. Americans are being asked to kiss Grandparents goodbye!
